review: My mother got admitted into his hospital as her fever was continuing for close to 10 days.  The doctor was very kind, comforting and shown lot of patience to hear the issues. He has clearly explained the possible causes for the fever and guided us through the  best procedure. He has clearly explained all our queries and provided with the necessary information. Hospital is maintained neat and clean, and staffs were friendly and helpful. Overall, our experience is very good and would recommend this hospital to others.

My wife experienced pain in her arms and also felt sick. I took her to the doctor the next day. They took the ECG and the doctor patiently attended her problem and concluded that she doesn't have any issues. He gave Siddha medicine to reduce her stress. My wife liked doctor's treatment. The clinic is maintained very well.

Hi all, 
My mother felt very sick and admitted her on 30-09-21 in very dangerous condition and have no hope of recovering but DR. Selvaghambir and Anbu hospital's entire team involved very pro actively in a positive manner and given me a good hope that my mother will definetly recover very soon. 
They diagnosed her to the core level and identified the root cause of the disease and almost cured it and she is now out of danger, also she is moved to private ward from ICU. 
Thank god for directing me to this hospital of honest, here the staffs are very polite, calm and caring i have ever seen in other hospitals, now i have a hope that my mother will recover completly very soon. 
They are very caring that even my mother is not cooperating for the treatment.
Thank you, 
M. C. Natarajan

context: Preventive care of Heart& Lung diseases,
review: The doctor was very friendly and calm to listen to us and explained remedy and gave precautionary advice in polite manner. Wishing him all the best for his journey. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Personally I thank you from bottom of my heart for your excellent treatment Sir. You are  reachable when I am really in need and guided me on time with right medication and hospitality. Excellent staff and caring and more responsible nurse.

Excellent. Listened to our problem patiently.
practical approach **** **** **********

the doctor is very well behaved and  he is friendly  and he is matured  enough to  answer all your problems.
